name: Cartwheel
title: getcartwheel.com
payoff: Animate characters easily on any device
shortDescription: Cartwheel offers a revolutionary approach to animating characters for various media such as videos, games, and social media. Users can smoothly combine motions for complex performances with just a few clicks. It allows the creation of characters from descriptions or art, and supports uploading of 3D character files for animation. Ideal for animators and content creators, Cartwheel can be used directly from a mobile browser, enhancing flexibility and accessibility.
pros: Easy combination and blending of motions
Supports both creation and upload of characters
